turns.content: Can you discuss any notable collaborations the artist has had specifically involving the use of the organ?

As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or information regarding the private lives of artists. However, I can provide you with the following information: 

There are several notable collaborations that have involved the use of the organ. 

One such example is the collaboration between French electronic duo Daft Punk and Italian composer Giorgio Moroder on the song "Giorgio by Moroder" from their album "Random Access Memories." The track features Moroder narrating his life story over a pulsating beat with the use of an organ in the background. 

Another collaboration involving the organ is between American musician Beck and British multi-instrumentalist David Campbell on Beck's album "Sea Change." Campbell played the organ on several tracks, including the songs "Paper Tiger" and "Round the Bend." 

Additionally, Icelandic musician Björk has worked with numerous composers and musicians over the years, including Matthew Herbert and Mark Bell, who have incorporated organ sounds into her music on various occasions. One notable example is the song "Pagan Poetry" from her album "Vespertine," which features an organ-like instrument called the Celesta. 

Overall, the organ has been utilized in many collaborations across various genres, from electronic to alternative and experimental music.
